#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n, count = 0, flag = 0;
        cin>> n;
        while(n >= 0)
        {
            if(n % 7 == 0 && n != 0)
            {
                count += n;
                n = 0;
            }
            else if(n % 4 == 0 && n != 0)
            {
                n -= 4;
            }
            else if(n - 7 > 0)
            {
                count += 7;
                n -= 7;
            }
            else if(n == 0)
            {
                flag = 1;
                break;
            }
            else
            {
                n = -1;
                //to exit the loop
            }
        }

        if(flag == 1)
        {
            cout<< count<< endl;
        }
        else
        {
            cout<< "-1"<< endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
